sentences.sContent: Yes. We have both the paperback and the hardcover.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yes. We have both the paperback and the hardcover.
sentences.sCn: 是的。我们有平装本和精装本。

sentences.sContent: Which do you prefer, the paperback or the hardcover?
sentences.sContent_eng: Which do you prefer, the paperback or the hardcover?
sentences.sCn: 平装书和精装书你更喜欢哪一个？

sentences.sContent: Our business scope includes hardcover, catalogues, top-grade magazines and high-tech product manuals etc.
sentences.sContent_eng: Our business scope includes hardcover, catalogues, top-grade magazines and high-tech product manuals etc.
sentences.sCn: 公司业务范围包括：精装书刊、目录、高档杂志及高科技产品说明书等。

synos.tran: 精装书；[图情]硬封面的书

remMethod.val: hard(硬的) + cover(包装) → 硬包装版 → 精装版本

words.tran: 精装本；[图情] 硬封面的书

trans.tranOther: a book that has a strong stiff cover
